Translations.Text: Em
S Tezmamt ipbegginen
Nerra p d Leqwoan s taaoabt, amar a pfehmem
Neppa, ih, ata $uone£, ar Tyimmap n Tezmamt, d aalayan, d uuwib
Day a kwen Neewwej seg usmekti, imi kunwi d agdud ipeawalen
Aceal id Nuzen d nnbi i imezwura
Ur ten id ippas nnbi, mebla ma mmaalken fellas
Nemea wid i ten yifen tazmert. U iuao umedya imezwura
Ma testequav ten: "anwa i Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan"? A d inin, war ccekk: "Ixelq iten Uzmir, Amusnaw
i wen Irran tamurt d ddue; i wen Igan, degs, iberdan - amendeo ma a ppeppwanhum
id Isse$layen, seg igenni, aman s lmizan - Nessakway yissen tamurt immuten; akka ara d tekkrem
id Ixelqen akw tiyugiwin, i wen Ifkan, si sfinat akked lmal, ara trekbem
A paanncem $ef iarar nnsen; sinna, a d tesmektim l$it n Mass nnwen, mara paanncem fellasen. A ppinim: "gedha s Win i d Inuben fella$ s waya, ur t nemlik
Ih, a nu$al ar Mass nne
Eesben ay T iaabden d amur segS. Amdan, s tidep, d anekkao n uuee
Ne$ day d Iddem tullas seg wayen Ixleq, u Ifren awen d arrac
Ma ibbwev ed usali yiwen segsen, $ef wayen id ifka d amedya i Uenin, ad yibrik wudem is, ad ikkufer
ayen d ikren di rreue, ur nessifrir anamer
Eesben lmalayek, i illan d ixdimen n Uenin, d nnta. Day eevoen i uxlaq nnsent? Tira $ef ccada nnsen; fellasen asteqsi
Nnan: "lemmer Irad Uenin, yili ur ten naabbid". Ur sain kra n tmusni $ef waya. Nitni la pxeooiven kan
Ne$ Nefka yasen Tazmamt, uqbel Tagi, d$a, degs, iifen
Xaii! Nnan: "nufa d, ih, imezwura nne$, di laaqida. D$a, nekwni, Nedda di lateo nnsen
Am akka, ur d Nuzen, uqbel ik, aneddao ar temdint, mebla ma nnan isaiyen is: "nufa d imezwura nne$ di laaqida. D$a, nedda d lateo nnsen
Inna: "i ma bbwi$ awen d nnhaya yifen tin id tufam ar imezwura nnwen"? Nnan: "nekwni, ihi, nugwi ayen is id teppuceggaam
Nerra d ppao, segsen. Muqel amek tevoa d inekkaoen
Mi inna Iboahim i baba s, akked ugdud is: "nek, ur pkka$ deg wayen la taabdem
kkes ed Win iyi d Ixelqen. D Neppa, s tidep, ara iyi Inhun
Irra t d awal imezgi i texlift is, amar a d u$alen s abrid
U £ate$ ten, nitni akked imezwura nnsen, armi ten id tusa tidep, akked umazan ipbegginen
Mi ten id tusa tidep, nnan: "wagi d sseur, ihi, nekwni nugi t
Nnan: "A lemmer id ssadren Leqwoan agi ar urgaz ameqwoaean n snat temdinin

Day d nitni i ifeooqen aeunu n Mass ik? D Nekwni i sen Ifeooqen tamaict nnsen, di tmeddurt n ddunit, u Nessuli kra segsen, tidekkaoin sennig wiyav, iwakken kra, ad sxedmen wiyav. Aeunu n Mass ik yif ayen jemaan
Lemmer macci yiwen n lois kan ara yilin imdanen, a Nerr tiseddura n lfeiia i ixxamen n wid inekoen Aenin, akw i tiseddaoin i$ef ara alin
i ixxamen nnsen, tibbura; imieoeen ideg ara elen
akked uzewweq. Maca, ayagi akw, d astumen i tmeddurt n ddunit. Laxeot, ar Mass ik, i wid ipeezziben
Win iooan asmekti n Uenin, ad as Nqelled Cciian, ad as yili d amsaaef
Ih, Nitni veooifen ten seg ubrid, u $ilen ar nitni pwanhan
Alamma ma iusa d $uone£, inna d: "ah, awufan gari yidek, amecwao illan ger ugmuv d wayev". A yir amsaaef
Ur kwen infaa, assa, d awez$i, ma tdensem. Aql akwen tcerkem aaaqeb
Day a pperrev, kecc, aaeeeug ad issel, ne$ a ppenhuv ader$al, akked win illan di ttelfan n uuee
Amar a k id Nekkes, d$a a d Nerr ppao segsen
ne$ ak Nessken ayen i sen d Nhegga. £uone£, ih, adabu fellasen
Iief deg wayen i k d ippuweeean. Kecc, war ccekk, aql ak deg ubrid uwqim
Wagi, ih, d asmekti i kecc, akked ugdud ik; deqqal fellawen asteqsi
Steqsi wid id Nuzen, uqbel ik, seg imazanen nne£. Day Nerra, war Aenin, ioebbiten ara aabden
Ni$ Nuzen ed Musa s issekniyen nne£, ar Feraun akked imvebboen is. Inna: "nek d amazan n Mass imavalen
Mi sen d ibbwi issekniyen nne£, nitni la ppavsan degsen
Ur asen Nessenaata assekni, siwa ma i$leb gma s. Nesaadda fellasen aaaqeb, amar a d u$alen s abrid
Nnan: "a yaseeear, naao a$ Mass ik, s lemaahda i k Ifka. Nekwni ara nepwanhu
Mi Nessafer aaaqeb fellasen, imiren ad xedaan
Imdee Feraun i ugdud is, inna: "a yagdud iw, day macci inu tagelda n Maseo, akked isaffen agi, i ippazalen seddaw i. Day ur twalam ara
Ne$ nek ur ife$ ara imdelli agi, ur nezmir ad ibeggen
Acimi ur as qqnen ara imeqyasen n uwoe$, ne$ ur d usint ara yides lmalayek, pwazdan t
Issefqaa agdud is. Unzen as. Wigi, ih, d agdud ucmit
Mi £ zzaafen, Nerra d ppao segsen, Ne$meq iten meooa
Nerra ten d asmekti u d amedya, i ineggura
Mi sen d ippunefk mmi s n Meryem, d amedya, agdud ik iugwi t
Qqaoen: "ppif ioebbiten nne$, ne$ Neppa"? Qqaoen ak d akka, i nnmara. Ih, nitni d agdud ipmeoean
Neppa d amdan kan. N$at it, Nerra t d amedya i At Isoail
Lemmer i£ £ ihwi, a Nerr lmalayek di tmurt, deg umkan nnwen
Neppa, s tidep, d ppbut n yimir. Ur ppilit di ccekk fellas. Ddut yidi; wagi d abrid uwqim
Ur kwen issefra$ Cciian! Ih, neppa d acengu nnwen n uuee
Mi n iusa Aisa s issekniyen, inna: "usi$ d $uowen s uuwab, ad awen beggne$ kra, seg wayen i$ef temgarradem. Ihi, eezzbet i Oebbi, ta$em iyi awal
Oebbi, s tidep, d Mass iw u d Mass nnwen. Ihi, aabdet eI, d wagi ay d abrid uwqim
Mgarraden ikabaren garasen. A tawa$it n wid idensen, ilmend uaaqeb n wass aqeoean
Day a poaoun imir, ad asen d ias, deqzalla, nitni ur bnin
Iebiben, assen, ad u$alen wa d acengu n wa, kkes ed wid ipeezziben
A yimdanen iW, assa, ur telli tugdi fellawen, ur $webblet
Wid iumnen s issekniyen nne£, u llan d imvuaen
Kecmet Loennet, kunwi akked tlawin nnwen, a ppezhum
Ad asen ddewwioen, s sniwat n uwoe$, akked ibuqalen; degsen ayen cihwant teowiein, ayen iqennaen allen. Kunwi, din, ad twekkoem
D tagi ay d Loennet i tweotem, ilmend n wayen txeddmem
Degs, i kunwi, aias n izwayen, segsen a ppeccem
Ibe$wviyen, s tidep, deg uaaqeb n Loahennama, ad wekkoen
Ur ipfukku fellasen. Nitni, degs, ad kkufferen
Ur ten Nednis, maca llan, nitni, d imednas
Ad necden: "a Malik, xas ad a$ Iqfeo Mass ik"! A d ini: "war ccekk, a pwellfem
Ni$ Nusa n $uowen, s tidep, maca tegwti, degwen, keohen tidep
Ne$ undin ticeokep. Ula d Nekwni Neppandi
Ne$ $ilen ur Nsell ara i lesrar nnsen, akked tumlin nnsen. Ihi, imceggaen nne£, $uosen, pparun
Ini: "lemmer illi mmi s i Uenin, nek d aabad amenzu
Gedha s Mass n tmurt akked igenwan, Mass n usgeld, mgal ayen pxeooiven
Anef asen ad nexxoen, ad uraren, alamma mmugren ass nnsen, i sen ippuwaaaden
D Neppa ay d Oebbi deg igenni, d Oebbi di tmurt, u d Bab n uuwab, d Amusnaw
Ioqa Win Ilan tagelda n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Ieoa melmi ay d imir. £uuoeS, ara tu$alem
Wid i la naaoen, war Neppa, ur $uosen kra n ccafuaa, kkes ed inagan n tidep, u nitni eoan
Ma testequav ten anwa iten Ixelqen, a d inin, war ccekk, "d Oebbi". Ihi, acimi zzin akin
Timenna s: "a Mass iw! Wigi, s tidep, d agdud ur numin
Wexxeo asen, ini: "tifrat"! Deqqal ad eoen
